description:
Indulge in the joy of effortlessly gliding across flat or gently downhill landscapes and relish the confidence of secure skin grip for uphill strides. The Salomon ESCAPE OUTRACK ski set is equipped with full steel edges and a versatile WHITEWOODS OUTLANDER binding that pairs with all hiking and winter shoes. With this complete set, you're ready to venture into the backcountry and explore with ease.

  • WoodCore with fiberglass wrap is light in weight, but with consistent torsional stiffness
  • S-cut sidecut has a light carving sidecut behind the foot and a wider platform at the front for more control and stability
  • Skin strip is made with 70% mohair and 30% nylon to deliver you a secure grip
  • Full-steel edges offer extra stability when venturing out of track
  • Precise stone grinding for easy glide in all snow conditions
  • Pre-mounted WHITEWOODS OUTLANDER bindings work with all hiking or winter footwear
name: Salomon Escape Outtrack Skis + Outlander Bindings - Unisex
